Renovated for comfort with the charm of old town Barcelona is the only way to describe the apartments on Verge. Famous expositions and private art galleries can be found on MACBA, while a variety of bars and restaurants can be found in Las Ramblas.

This apartment is perfect for 2 people with one bedroom, one bathroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, a washing machine, a dryer, a TV, a hairdryer, elevator access, Internet, A/C and heating.

The Ramblas Boqueria Penthouse is located in a newly renovated building, with elevator access, on the beautiful streets of La Boqueria market. Located a small distance from the metro station and Plaza Catalunya, as well as many other destinations, this apartment has much to offer to international study abroad students.

The penthouse apartment can house 2 people with one bedroom and one bathroom, as well as a spacious living room and kitchen. Also included in the apartment: a TV, Internet, elevator access, A/C, heating, bed linen & towels, a washing machine, a dryer and a dishwasher.

This study abroad apartment has an open layout with a living room that consists of a pull out couch and a flat screen television, and there is a well-equipped kitchenette. There are two large bedrooms with queen size beds, large dressers and a private bathroom. The other bedroom, located on the lower level of this apartment unit has two single beds with its own entrance to the bedroom and bathroom. All beds will be rearranged depending on the number of students.

The apartment is spacious and bright, and consists of a cozy living area with vaulted ceilings. The kitchen is traditional styled but still is composed of all the amenities necessary for study abroad students. There are two bedrooms, one is large and one a little smaller, and there is one bathroom. The apartment also has small balcony with a nice view, and air conditioning in the main room. Beds can (and will) be rearranged according to the number of tenants.

< APARTMENT IS BOOKED >   This apartment is in a great location for study abroad living, it is just a few minutes away from the city center, and is surrounded by bakeries and other shops managed by locals. There is a large living room will wall-to-wall windows, all of which have amazing views. The kitchen is fully equipped has a separate dining area. There are laundry facilities, situated with patio doors that lead to a lovely terrace overlooking a courtyard. There are two bedrooms, one with a queen size bed and a desk, and the second is furnished with two twin beds. Both rooms are spacious and have ample storage space. The bathroom is newly renovated and consists of a walk in shower and bathtub.

Located just a few steps from the Duomo, and around the corner from the Santa Croce Cathedral, this apartment building is in a great location for living abroad. It is completely renovated and really captures the essence of Florence with a great view of Piazza Sant’Ambrogio and the Synagogue. The kitchen is fully equipped with a small utility room in which you can find everything you need for cleaning. There is a full bathroom as well as a laundry room with a brand new washing machine. The living room is big and spacious with a double sofa bed, a dining table, a flat screen television and a large beautiful window. There are 2 large bedrooms as well.

This modern three bedroom apartment in Barcelona, situated in Eixample, is the perfect apartment for study abroad students. This ´barrio´ is a great choice for those who seek a comfortable place to call home during their time in the city, as this neighborhood is renowned for the finest tapas bars, excellent shopping areas and some magnificent architecture. The apartment can be found close to the Plaça d´Espanya and the Fira de Montjuïc. The living area has a comfortable sofa and a TV, perfect for relaxing after a day of  class and studying. Perfect for abroad exchange students to get work done and relax. There is a large double bedroom and two more bedrooms in this apartment. The apartment has one bathroom with a walk in shower. This spacious apartment has all the requirements for your semester abroad to Barcelona, any time of the year! Metro station: Tarragona (L3)

APARTMENT FEATURES

Sleeps: 3-4 Bedrooms: 3 Bathrooms: 1 Beds: Arranged accordingly to number of tenants.

 TV WIFI internet Elevator Air conditioning Towels and bed linen Washing machine Oven and microwave Cooking and serving utensils Set of Linens per Student: 1

Towels per Student: 1

Situated in a comfortable ‘barrio’ in Eixample and surrounded by some of the best tapas bars, shopping areas and architecture, students studying in Barcelona can certainly feel right at home in this 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment. Recently renovated and refurbished, this apartment can house 3-4 individuals with amenities such as: a TV, an elevator, Internet, A/C, towels and bed linen, a washing machine and a kitchen with a microwave, oven and utensils. Metro station: Tarragona (L3)

The Vila Vila apartment complex in Barcelona is the best housing option for students studying abroad. It sits right off of Paral-lel Street and a short walk from Las Ramblas and the port and beaches. Vila Vila also has great travel connections to main attractions in the area and is surrounded by various bars and restaurants. The apartment is suitable for up to 5 guests with three bedrooms and one bathroom as well as a fully equipped kitchen. It also has Internet, elevator access, A/C, bed linens & towels, a washing machine, and a TV.

The apartment provides ample living and dining space for 5 people with three bedrooms and two bathrooms, A/C, a TV, heating, Internet, terrace, bed linens and towels, elevator access and a fully equipped kitchen.

The Reloj apartment is ideally located for international students looking to explore the Borne area and beaches of La Barceloneta while studying in Barcelona. Perfect for larger groups, this five bedroom and two- bathroom apartment can make your stay an experience you won’t forget. Newly renovated and decorated with additional features such as: a flat screen TV, A/C, central heating, Internet, a washing machine, a dryer, a balcony, a hairdryer, bed linens and towels and a microwave.

The Condal apartment in Barcelona is located in the central area of the city Plaza Catalunya, a popular destination for many study abroad students. This apartment is the perfect set up for international students with a short walk to classes, Passeig de Gracia and the luxurious streets of Barcelona.

The apartment can sleep up to 5 people with three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a living room, a dining room and a complete kitchen. Other features of the apartment that will make your stay comfortable include: a TV + DVD, a stereo + CD player, A/C, heating, bed linens & towels, an iron and iron board, a washing machine, dishwasher and a balcony.

The apartment is situated on the eighth floor of the building with a private terrace that allows you to observe the beautiful city views and relax after classes or traveling.

The apartment features three bedrooms and one bathroom, perfect for a group of 4 people, with elevator access, a private terrace, Internet, a TV, A/C, central heating, a washing machine, an iron, and a fully equipped kitchen including a dishwasher.

Metro Station: Rocafort (L1)
The Gaudi apartment in Barcelona can accommodate up to 6 students with three bedrooms, three bathrooms, a living room and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher. The building also offers parking.

Putxet Penthouse is located in the Gracia area bordering Putxet and Eixample and within a short distance walk of Lesseps metro station. Everything a student needs while abroad can be found here including: pharmacies, supermarkets, dry cleaners and shopping areas. The penthouse is divided into three different levels in order to make the apartment look more dynamic with a large living room, a dining room, a balcony, a terrace and a fully equipped kitchen. It has 3 bedrooms and one bathroom, which is suitable for up to 6 students, and includes features of: Internet, an iron, a hairdryer, a TV, A/C, heating, a washing machine and a dryer. There is also private parking available for purchase if needed. Metro Station: Lesseps (L-3)

Putxet Duplex is an elegant and comfortable apartment divided into two levels which make the entire flat look even more dynamic and elegant. One large living/dining room and a fully equipped kitchen are situated on the first level. The second level is a calmer part. It has three comfortable double bedrooms, one of which is a suite with a private bathroom, closet and a balcony. The other two bedrooms have two beds each one and there is another bathroom with a shower. This apartment can accommodate 6 up to people. The living room is equipped with two sofa beds. The kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, microwave, coffee machine, electric cooker, kettle, oven, fridge, fridge-freezer, and vitroceramic cooker. This apartment is in a great location, only steps away from the Duomo, the San Lorenzo Market, and all of the main Floence monuments. The apartment is surrounded by tons of shops, restaurants, cafes and bars. It consists of a living/ dining area with a beautifully painted ceiling, a kitchen (small, but fully equipped), and 2 bedrooms. One has a double bed, and one has two singles and a bathroom with a shower. The apartment is air-conditioned.

Newly renovated apartment in ancient quarter of Florence. 

Illuminated with generous natural light and furnished in a bright and pleasant color palette, this 2 bedroom holiday rental is located on the ground floor of an ancient Florentine building in Piazza Piattellina. Just steps away from Piazza del Carmine in the Oltrarno district. This historic neighborhood of the city is renowned for its abundance of Renaissance works of art from masters like Masaccio, Masolino and Filippo Lippi. Charming cobble stoned street, removed from the path of tourist traffic, this area is well loved by the locals. Just a 15 minute walk to the Santa Maria Novella Station, this area is well connected yet affords a pleasant escape.  Completely renovated with all new and modern comforts, the apartment provided you will all of the comforts of home. There is an immediate air of freshness as you enter in the beautifully lit corridor. Carefully decorated with classic taste, the combination of modern refurbishments with traditional furnishings creates an atmosphere of serenity and home. The airy living room with dining for 4, leads to a spectacular outdoor garden. This green area is flooded with sunlight year round, making it the perfect spot for enjoying a relaxing moment under the Tuscan sunshine. The beautiful kitchen is well equipped will all of the necessities. There is a stovetop range and microwave in place of an oven, and vacuum cleaner. The bedroom are spacious in size and well lit. Each has a queen bed that can be separated into twins if requested.

The Gaudi Duplex II apartment in Barcelona sits in the heart of the district Gracia. Being spacious enough to adequately sleep up to 6 people, it features three bedrooms and two bathrooms as well as a dining room and living room with two sofa beds for guests. A fully equipped kitchen that includes a dishwasher will make international students feel right at home while studying in Barcelona.

Other amenities include: a TV, A/C, heating, Internet, washing machine, a dryer, an iron, and a hairdryer.

The Pool Deck Duplex apartment in Barcelona is the perfect accommodation for larger groups, being able to house up to 6 people with three bedrooms, two baths, a living room and a fully equipped kitchen. Other apartment features include: a dishwasher, an iron, a hairdryer, a TV, A/C, heating, a washing machine, a dryer, Internet access and a swimming pool.

Other apartment features include: a dishwasher, an iron, a hairdryer, a TV, A/C, heating, a washing machine, a dryer, Internet access and a swimming pool.

Located right off Piazza Santa Maria in Trastevere, this student apartment in Rome offers a true cultural experience with the classic medieval ambiance of Trastevere from its wood beam ceilings, fireplace decorated with italian ceramics, and terracotta floors. The living room is furnished with a sofa bed for 2, Sat TV, coffee table, and the kitchen corner outfitted with a breakfast table, utensils, oven, fridge and gas stove. Travel up the wooden stairs to the hardwood floors of the 2nd level. Luxurious with the comfort of a king sized bed, a small desk, big wardrobe, and an immaculate naturally-lit bathroom with a washer, stall shower, bidet, and a sunny skylight!

Located on the Plaza of the Barley in a nineteenth century; with 7 balconies to the street and has all the amenities: air conditioning, heating, ADSL WiFi, etc. It is ideal for those visitors traveling as a family or group, but want to maintain your privacy, your good distribution in 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms instead. One bathroom is separated by a hallway. With shower and separate toilet. It has no sink. This apartment sleeps up to 8 or 10 people offers a comfortable and affordable stay in a prime location has a double bed and a balcony outside.; one room with double bed inside; another room with 2 single beds and a balcony to the outside; and a fourth bedroom with 2 single beds and 2 outdoor balconies, all with everything needed to enjoy tranquility in private after a day spent exploring the city. In the lounge, which also has 2 balconies, there is also a large double sofa bed for larger groups. It has an outdoor dining area with balcony and a large dining table to comfortably enjoy good meals and desktops to regain strength before facing the city. The kitchen is well equipped with everything you need including dishwasher, essential for large groups.The bathrooms are divided into three rooms: one with bath, a toilet and a shower, bare minimum to start the morning with energy and confront this city so exciting is undoubtedly the best choice for those looking. comfort, a great location and an affordable price.
  • 4 bedroom
  • 2 bathroom
  • 5-7 people

Located near the Tiber River and a two-minute walk from Ponte Sisto, this newly renovated two-
bedroom apartment is perfect for students seeking a prime location and lots of amenities. The large

living room has a sectional sofa, four-person dining table and corner kitchenette. The first, larger

bedroom has a matrimonial bed, but can be configured as two twins at the tenants request. The

second bedroom has two single beds and a bright, open feel. The brand new bathroom has large, walk-
in shower and rainwater shower head. This apartment is a great fit for those desiring a great

apartment just steps from Trastevere and the historic sights of Rome.

< APARTMENT IS BOOKED > This study abroad Florence apartment is in the perfect location, just a short distance from Piazza Santa Croce, and right by Sant’Ambrogio’s daily farmers market. It is close to a super market and all of the main monuments and attractions. Additionally the area is filled with delicious restaurants of the Tuscan cuisine. There are two large bedrooms, both bright and spacious, and each has its own bathroom. The master bedroom has a queen-sized bed with ample storage space, and the second has two singles with storage as well. The kitchen is fully equipped, and has a dining table, which seats four.

The Unio apartment sits just a five- minute walk to Las Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya and a ten- minute drive to UAB and other international universities & study abroad programs. This location makes the Unio apartment a great option for study abroad students! It can accommodate up to 6 people with three bedrooms and two bathrooms as well as a living room, a dining room and a fully equipped kitchen. Other features include: a balcony, a private terrace, Internet and a TV.

Situated in San Niccolò neighbourhood, close to Santa Croce, Ponte Vecchio and piazzale Michelangelo. The building is newly renovated. There is a double living room/dining room overlooking the historic Bardini gardens. There are two bedrooms as well as a spacious bathroom with a large shower, and a kitchen that is fully equipped. The apartment has the luxuries of air conditioning in every room; free WiFi, and an Apple television.

The pool deck duplex II apartment in Barcelona can accommodate up to 7 people in 3 bedrooms with either 6 or 7 individual beds. The apartment has 3 complete bathrooms, and the living room has a double sofa bed for extra guests. The kitchen is fully equipped with a dishwasher, coffee machine, electric kettle, oven, fridge, fridge / freezer and cooktop.

On the first floor there is a spacious living room with nicely designed furniture, a double sofa bed and a plasma Television, and here is where you will find the entrance onto the balcony. On the balcony there are wood tables and chairs. The kitchen and the living room are connected through a sliding door, and on this floor you can find a double bedroom with two beds and a full bathroom.  On the second level is a suite with a bathroom and another double room with two single beds and an extra bathroom. All bedrooms have built in wardrobes.

It also features a living room with a LED TV, a dining room, a modern kitchen with cooking appliances, Internet, a washing machine and a dryer.

The apartment can comfortably sleep up to 12 individuals, which makes it easy for large groups of friends to live together while abroad. There are five bedrooms, two ½ baths, a living room with high ceilings and a fully equipped kitchen.

The Corral del Rey apartment tucked away in the heart of Seville is an ideal choice .....

This modern one bedroom apartment is a true gem and cannot but make your stay that bit more special.

The area surrounding the Apartment; 

This apartment enjoys a great location!!

As with most of our apartments this property is really no different with regards to location. Situated in the old quarter most "must-see" monuments are within walking distance, some further than others but nothing is really more than a 20 minute walk from the apartment. The Barrio Santa Cruz is a five minute walk...

The nearest is the Casa Pilatos, literally down the road from the apartment, this a small palace built in the 16th century. Then of course, about a 12 minute walk away are the Giralda, the Cathedral and the Royal Alcazar (another palace). Five minutes from that you are at the river, with the Torre del Oro and a bit further along is the Maestranza bullring.... 

The main shopping area is also close by, after visiting Casa Pilatos you can continue to walk another 10-15 minutes through the Alfafa, and you are in the main commerical area of Seville, the streets Tetuán, Sierpes and Cuna are within minutes of each other as is El Corte Inglés. Great shopping for all!

The river in the spring/summer time, is a great place to go in the evening, there are many outdoor bars with tables and chairs where you can spend a relaxing time watching Seville go by!!

The Apartment; 

Located on the third floor of a refurbished building, its entrance disguises a fantastic modern interior.

As you walk in the door you find yourself in the living area, with a comfortable sofa (this is a sofabed, although double we recommend 1 adult or two children) and two modern armchairs all ideal for sitting down and relaxing or watching some TV after a day out in Seville.

The large kitchen is fully equipped, guests can sit around the dining table just outside the kitchen and enjoy great meals!

The bathroom is a good size, with shower, WC and basin. Fresh towels are provided upon arrival. 

The bedroom has a large, comfortable bed with an ornate headboard and a built-in wardrobe for all your belongings.
  • APPLIANCES: washing machine, iron & ironing board, hairdryer, fridge-freezer, blender, toaster, vitroceramic cooker, microwave, coffee maker

This recently renovated apartment overlooks the green area of Piazza Tasso, and is walking distance from the famous landmarks of Florence’s historic city centre, making it a great location for someone living abroad. Classic in Italian design, this lovely Florence apartment is located in a beautiful palazzo along the impressive Borgo Degli Albizi. As you enter the apartment, there is a living room with a working fireplace, and a dining table that seats up to 8. There is a fully equipped kitchen, and the master bedroom with a bathroom and a tub. There is additional studio space and room for sleeping on this floor with another full bathroom. On the second floor, there is a second living room, bedroom, and bathroom. There is also a terrace with an impressive full view of Florence.

This Florentine apartment is located in a lively area filled with charming shops, restaurants, a cinema, and local Florentines. This area is in authentic Italy, allowing students to explore the area as a local rather than a tourist, a great opportunity. It accommodates to four people with two bedrooms, one full bathroom, and laundry facilities. Classically decorated, the apartment is furnished with striking elements, and includes a terrace with an amazing view of the Duomo. There is a fully equipped kitchen and a dining area.

Located on a small street in the heart of Florence, living in this apartment will give you a true sense of the life in this city. Right outside the building are main attractions such as the Duomo, Piazza Signoria, Ponte Vecchio and the Uffizi Gallery, as well as numerous restaurants, cafes, markets, and the best gelato shops. It could not be a better location for a study abroad student! In addition, there is a cute little fresh fruit stand right outside the door! The spacious and open floor plan has a living room area with dining, which seats six, as well as a fully equipped kitchen.The apartment has four single beds, which is nice as it accommodates all guests equally.
post_excerpt: This apartment has an open living space, and is surrounded by all the main attractions of Florence. It has 4 single beds, in which all guests are accommodated equally.

post_content: Located on the sixth floor of a building with an elevator, this Florence apartment is contemporary, and recently renovated. About a 20-minute walk to the Duomo and well connected to the centre by public transportation, it is ideal for study abroad living. In addition, it has a beautiful view of the historical centre. The living space can comfortably accommodate up to four people. There is a bedroom with two single beds, ample storage space, and is well furnished. The living area includes a full sofa bed that allows for comfortable sleeping for two. There is a beautiful wood-burning fireplace, which adds warmth and character to the living rom. There is a fully equipped and bright kitchen, and a luminous and beautifully decorated bathroom. Additionally, there is a lovely outdoor terrace space. This apartment has all the comforts one would want in a home, and has all accommodations necessary for a student living abroad.

Located just one block from the Duomo, this loft style, two level apartment is equipped with an elevator and modern furnishings. The lower level consists of a large living/dinging area with a sofa and sofa chair, a wide screen television, and a dining table which seats up to six. The kitchen area is equipped with four burners, an oven, microwave, fridge/freezer and a small courtyard. Additionally there is a covered terrace with a wooden table for dining with four chairs, and another with two. The downstairs bathroom has a fold out shower, but the upper level bathroom is equipped with a tub. The upper level includes a bedroom area with a double bed. The apartment is fully equipped with linens, dinnerware, Wi-Fi and air conditioning.

This comfortable and recently renovated apartment is located on the second floor of the building, in a central location of the city centre. It is walking distance to all of the city’s important monuments, and located on a lively street with many shops, bakeries and small cafes. This Florence apartment is perfect for study abroad students as it accommodated up to four people. There is one master bedroom with a queen sized bed, high ceilings, and ample storage space. The spacious living room includes a full sofa bed, dining for four people, and a charming wood fireplace. The kitchen is fully equipped and provides an additional dining area for four. Exposed beamed ceilings throughout the apartment create a cozy and traditional Florence atmosphere, and large windows provide for bright natural lighting. Lastly, there is a bathroom and laundry facilities.

This Florence apartment is in a perfect location for a study abroad student. Located at the foot of Piazzale Michelangelo, two large windows overlook the river and main monuments of Florence. The apartment is surrounded by restaurants and lively night life, and is only a few steps away from all the monuments of the city. It consists of a bright open floor plan with a living room furnished with a large and comfortable sofa, which transforms into two single beds, and a flat screen television. There is one bedroom equipped with a wardrobe, and there are two storage rooms, both with lighting for additional storage. There is a modern and equipped kitchen, with a dining area that overlooks the ancient walls of Florence, and is furnished with an antique wooden table that can accommodate up to ten people.

Located in a modern building with an elevator, this apartment has been completely renovated and perfect for a study abroad student in Florence. It is in a great location, right near the historic and lively Piazza Santa Croce. The entrance opens to a fully equipped kitchen with a table that seats four. There is a living room with a sofa bed as well as a flat-screen TV. Sliding doors open up to a spacious double bedroom with ample storage space, and lastly a full bathroom.

This Florence study abroad apartment is classically decorated, and offers all of the comforts you would want in a home. Large windows flood the apartment with natural light, and provide a view of the charming Florentine street below. Located on the third floor of a classic mid century building, is it walking distance to all of the famous Florentine landmarks, and surrounded by charming boutiques, traditional bakeries, cafes and specialty shops- It is truly in a prime location. A beautiful marble fireplace and an intricately designed ceramic floor are the focal points of this spacious living area. The apartment can accommodate 4 people: it has 1 large bedroom with a queen sized bed, ample storage space with a walk in closet and built in cabinetry, and a sofa bed that provides l comfortable sleeping for two. The kitchen is open, spacious, and fully equipped, and there is a full bathroom and laundry facilities.

In the heart of Santo Spirito, this apartment is extremely close to Piazza Santo Spirito, Palazzo Pitti, Boboli Gardens, the Arno  River and Ponte Vecchio- all important spots of Florence. In addition there are numerous markets, small grocery stores and many wonderful restaurants in this vibrant area of Florence. There is one large, and elegant bedroom with a double sized bed. The space is quiet, located on the ground floor of a 16th Century building. There is an open living space with a sofa bed and a kitchen, a nice bathroom, and a beautiful and quaint private outdoor space. This apartment is the perfect size style and condition for a study abroad student in Florence.

This elegant and newly renovated apartment has everything a student would need to study abroad in Florence. Strategically located in the beautiful district of San Lorenzo, all of the most important places in Florence are walking distance away. The apartment is modern but cozy, creating a pleasant and comfortable feeling to the unit. The space has a comfortable sofa bed, a large armoire, a table with chairs, a fully equipped kitchen and a fresh, modern bathroom. The apartment is equipped with central heating, cable, and Internet. For larger groups, this apartment is one of seven apartments in this building. Its original style combined with its modern comfort makes the apartment the perfect choice for a unique experience living abroad in Florence!

Newly renovated and located in the trendy area of Florence, this is the perfect Florence apartment for a study abroad student. Located on the first floor of a typical Florentine building in the charming square of Piazza Tasso, it is surrounded by authentic restaurants, wine shops and a serene garden park. The apartment can accommodate up to 4 people. There is one bedroom with a king bed that can be separated into two singles for convenience, a living area with a sofa bed, a brand new bathroom, and laundry facilities. There is an open living area with a fully equipped kitchen, which leads to an outdoor balcony with a beautiful view.

Located in the heart of Florence, this studio apartment is newly renovated and in a great location, just a few steps from Piazza Santa Croce! The flat opens into a kitchen dining area that has everything you’ll need for use, as well as laundry facilities.

There is a large bedroom with a queen sized bed as well as plenty of storage space. Original wood beam ceilings are a focal point of the apartment, and add rustic character to the contemporary furnishings.

Located in the Gracia neighborhood, this Verdi Gracia Barcelona apartment complex is in a quiet and charming Barcelona district, also known as one of the most artistic and residential. This building is between the four main squares of Gracia, Plaza de la Virreina, Plaza del Sol, Plaza del Diamant, and Plaza de la Revolució, granting international students the convenience of social activities, nice restaurants and boutique shopping. The Verdi Gracia apartments in Barcelona provide easy access to international universities and classes with a five-minute walk to the nearest metro station. Students will enjoy the apartment's spacious, bright and modern features, as well as a beautiful rooftop terrace for sunbathing and relaxing! The building also includes 24-hour camera surveillance.

This building has definitely been a favorite for students throughout the past few years !

The Sant Joan apartments are located in the popular area of Eixample where Ildefons Cerdá created a city structure of octagonal block forming a strict grid pattern- and it's now a landmark in Barcelona. Bordering El Borne and sitting very close to many international universities, students studying abroad can explore all there is to offer without traveling far.

This spacious apartment can sleep 5 people with three bedrooms and two baths as well as a living room and dining room.

This spacious apartment can sleep 4-6 people with four bedrooms and two baths as well as a living room and dining room. It also has a fully equipped kitchen, a washing machine and dryer, A/C, a TV, an iron, a hairdryer, bed linen and towels, Internet, and a balcony.

The Londres apartment in Barcelona is located in one of the best areas of the Eixample district flooded with locals, terraces, wide streets and boulevards which makes it a highly requested housing spot for students studying abroad. It is also very well connected to the rest of the city so traveling is never difficult for international students.

The Londres apartment is suitable for larger groups with three bedrooms and two ½ baths. It also comes equipped with a living room, a TV, two sofas, a dining room, bed linen and towels, heated floor tiles, elevator access, Internet and a fully finished kitchen with a dishwasher.

This elegant thoughtfully furnished apartment offers all of the comforts and amenities you expect and deserve. Included are LCD cable television, stereo, washer/dryer and air-conditioning. The modern kitchen is fully equipped with a complete range of appliances providing you with all of the comforts of home. The apartment is comfortable for up to 4 guests.

Located in the heart of Trastevere in Via della Pelliccia, this large 1 bedroom apartment is situated on the 2nd floor of a small apartment building. This unique Rome apartment opens into the living room arranged with a large sofa and a round 4 person dining table. It's kitchen is fully equipped with a stove, oven, dishwasher and washing machine. Take the elaborate staircase to the spacious second floor bedroom complimented by a dressing area with wall closets, and a full bath with a tub/shower. This apartment has a lot of closets, so storage isn't an issue! Continue up to the third floor to the small desk/study room or explore the magnificent terrace, which is a great place to fully experience the beauty of Rome!

Situated in the picturesque streets of Rome's Prati neighborhood, this 1,184 sqft 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment is flawless for students studying abroad. The apartment has original parquet floors, high ceilings and its oversized corridor lined with closets gives ample storage while uniquely providing access to a small terrace. The spacious living room is furnished with a large sectional sofa, a love seat, and a dining table for six. The first smaller bedroom is also perfect for a study or office. The second and third bedrooms are of equal size and provide plenty of storage space. The smaller bathroom has beautiful tile work and a large stall shower. The larger bathroom has plently of storage space, a dual vanity and shower. The kitchen is fully equipped with a large refridgerator, 4 burner gas stove, oven, microwave and washing machine. Wi-Fi installed.

This Prague apartment has two floors, one double bedroom with an option of a double bed or two single beds. One bedroom with two single beds, one bedroom with one single bed, and there is  one complete bathroom with a shower. The apartment in Prague is equipped with complete bedding and towel sets. The living room is modern with a sofa-bed, flat screen television/ DVD and CD player. The building has air conditioning and central heating throughout and a fully equipped kitchen with all the electrical appliances including dishwasher and crockery. There is also access to WIFI and international TV channels that is conducive for study abroad students.
  • Nearest metro station "Karlovo Namesti" (Line B)
  • Nearest tram stop "Botanicka zahrada" (Lines 18 and 24)
  • 24-hour surveillance cameras inside and outside of the building
  • 24 hour reception service in the same building

Nestled in one of Rome's oldest neighborhoods, this large Trastevere 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment is an exceptional find for up to 5 students. The apartment brings in lots of light with large double-paneled windows in each room, and also features hardwood floors throughout. The living area is furnished with a sofa, dining table for 5, a fully equipped kitchen with two refridgerators, a 4 burner gas stove and a oven. The first bedroom is unique in that it can be used as a guest room with its french bed, or as a study/library. The second and third bedrooms both have two single beds, and one has a large wardrobe and the other a walk-in closet. The spacious bathroom brings in great light, has a large shower and is decorated with custom tile work. This Rome apartment also features a washing machine and Wi-Fi.

Located on Via Roma Libera, in the heart of Trastevere.  Walking distance to all the Universities in Trastevere with local farmers market each morning in the Piazza San Cosimato and just steps away from the famous Piazza Santa Maria in Trastevere.  Markets, restaurants, cafe's all in the area.  Very safe and full of life! 2 bedrooms with 2 twins beds in each room, very sunny apartment with windows that face the Piazza San Cosimato. 2nd floor with doorman. This apartment is simple and nice with lots of closet space and Internet. Great for 4 people. Kitchen has all, full fridge, microwave, stove & oven with dish washer! The bathroom has a shower and the washing machine is located here. Very nice apartment.

This lovely 3rd floor apartment has two equally large bedrooms. One bedroom has two single beds and one bedroom with a queen sized bed. The apartment has great light throughout which also helps keep great circulation during the summer months! Wifi, washing machine, huge bathtub and shower separate, basic digital cable a new flat screen TV which can be positioned in different angles from the wall. Tiles floor throughout. This apartment was recently renovated and in great and modern condition!

Located in one of the most prestigious corners of Trastevere, this Rome apartment is great for a party of up to 8 students in its 2500sq. ft.. Complete with the luxury and safety of a doorman and an elevator, you enter the elegant building through one of the two marble lobbies. 4 spacious bedrooms, a living room with a piano and antique sofa, a big storage room, and a fully equipped kitchen with all the esentials. One of the bathrooms has a tub and the other has a stall shower. Washing machine, Wi-Fi, great amenities and only steps away from the picturesque Piazza San Cosimato, where students can shop through daily fresh produce market.

This apartment has it all! 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom special apartment on the first floor of a spectacular sixteenth century palace and only a short walk to Piazza Santa Maria in Trastevere. Original exposed brick is an exceptional element to the great room. Accompanied by a sofa bed and a dining room table that for up to 8 people. Fully equipped kitchen - full-sized refrigerator, washing machine, dishwasher, microwave and gas stove top with oven. Master bedroom complete with full sized bed, and plenty of closet space. The second bedroom has two single beds as well as another single in a lofted sleeping space. Both en-suite bathrooms feature modern fixtures and a spacious shower with a rainwater shower head. Exceptional qualities for a short or long term student, this Rome apartment has the best location, size, amenities and luxury!

Everything is brand new! This Rome 2 bedroom apartment is furnished with tasteful furiniture, tile floors, abundant closet space, plenty of windows, and even a balcony off the master bedroom. The living room and first bedroom are connected by hallway, and another corridor for the 2nd bedroom. The living room uniquely has a skylight which floods the room with natural light, and the kitchen is equipped with 4 stove tops, a oven and a microwave. This apartment is great for students looking for housing in Rome!

A truly amazing location! This Rome student apartment is in a quiant area in the outskirts of Campo de' Fiori, far enough from the noise but close enough to experience the antique markets and delicious pizzerias. The aparment is spacious and beautiful, with 65 mt2/680ft2, it can accommodate up to 4 people quite comfortably. The apartment has 1 large bedroom with a full sized bed, complimented by plenty of storage space for clothing, a fully equipped kitchen with 4 stove tops, A/C, a washing machine, and independent heating and hardwood floors.The living room is gracefully arranged with a full sized sofa bed and chairs decorated with lavish paintings. The newly remodeled high quality funiture and decor makes this Rome apartment a perfect getaway in an extrordinary neighborhood!

Located on the border of Prague zone 1 and Prague zone 2, this high-end apartment building is situated in Nove Mesto. This stylish and spacious apartments offer free exclusive services including 24-hour reception service in the building. The complex also has locker areas to store luggage and a full-service maintenance team. For transportation, the nearest metro station is "Karlovo Namesti" (Line B) and the nearest tram stop is "Botanicka zahrada" (Lines 18 and 24) making for an easy commute to class and various international universities. Apartments come with high-speed WIFI and TV access to various international channels. The building has a 24-hour surveillance camera security system and entrance to the complex is only enabled with security pass codes given to study abroad apartments tenants.

  • 1 double bedroom with an option of double bed or 2 single beds
  • 1 bedroom with 2 single beds
  • 1 full bathroom with a shower
  • Apartment equipped with complete bedding and towels sets for each study abroad students

This beautiful apartment, located in Eixample, has various connections to all the must-see sites and attractions Barcelona has to offer. Being that it is about a five-minute walk from most international universities, it is ideal for students who are studying abroad. It’s also located in close proximity to the world- famous church Sagrada Familia which is a must see historic site for anyone visiting the area.

The apartment is perfect for bigger groups- having enough space to comfortably sleep 6 people with four bedrooms and two bathrooms. It includes amenities such as a plasma TV, Internet, elevator access, A/C and heating, towels and bed linen, a washing machine and a dryer. It also comes with a furnished kitchen inclusive of a dishwasher, a microwave, an oven and cooking/ serving utensils.

The Arc de Teatre sits in heart of the Old City, just steps away from Las Ramblas. It is the perfect housing option for students looking to study abroad, located minutes from the La Boqueria supermarket, the Columbus monument, Montjuic Mountain, Old Port and Barceloneta, just to name a few. Students who have a passion for fashion can also find themselves a short distance from great shopping areas like Plaza Catalunya, Paseo de Gracia and Rambla de Catalunya. This apartment is ideal for international students’ looking to experience all Barcelona has to offer!

The apartment can sleep up to 4 people with two bedrooms and one bathroom, as well as having a living room, a dining room and a fully equipped kitchen. Other apartment features include: bed linens & towels, a hairdryer, a dishwasher, a TV, central heating, A/C, an iron & iron board and a balcony.

Convenience just outside your door! Situated on one of the most important streets of Trastevere, this 2 bedroom, 1 bath apartment is great for any student! Secured by a doorman and easily accesible by elevator, students can explore with ease. This apartment is surrounded by an outdoor produce market, and international foods store, supermarkets and shopping. Cook up dinner parties in your luxurious kitchen, furnished with marble countertops, a full-sized refridgerator, oven, and a long country styled table with seating for 8! The master bedroom is extraordinary, with one queen and one single sized bed, ABUNDANT closet space, and a huge window with a spectacular view of Piazza San Cosimato. The second bedroom is just as grand with a special balcony facing an internal coutrtyard. This apartment offers a one of a kind adventure for students in Rome!

Situated on a quiet Trastevere street, this 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment is perfect for students studying in Rome. Located on the first floor (American second floor), this apartment has a spacious living room furnished with a sectional sofa, dining table for 4, and a cozy wood burning fire place. The small kitchen corner utilizes space and is equipped with a four burner gas stove top and a washing machine. Each bedroom can easily accomodate two single beds, or one larger bed, and has ample storage space for short or long term stays. The luxurious bathroom has a large walk-in shower, newly tiled vanity, and built in storage for toiletries.

This study abroad Florence apartment is in the perfect location, just a short distance from Piazza Santa Croce, and right by Sant’Ambrogio’s daily farmers market. It is close to a super market and all of the main monuments and attractions. Additionally the area is filled with delicious restaurants of the Tuscan cuisine. There are two large bedrooms, both bright and spacious, and each has its own bathroom. The master bedroom has a queen-sized bed with ample storage space, and the second has two singles with storage as 2well. The kitchen is fully equipped, and has a dining table, which seats four.

This apartment unit is great for a study abroad student living in Florence. It is on the second floor of a building with an elevator, and traditionally decorated. It is located in the most desired residential area of the city, Campo di Marty, and is surrounded by local shops, cafes and supermarkets. The apartment can accommodate up to 5 as there are 3 bedrooms, all with high ceilings and ample storage space. The master bedroom has a queen size bed, the second has two single beds, and the third has a single bed as well. the large kitchen area is fully equipped, and the living room has a dining table which accommodates six. It leads out to an outdoor balcony with views to gardens. There is one full bathroom as well as laundry facilities.

This bright and modern apartment is located in central Florence, perfect for study abroad living. The living space is open and spacious, and consists of a lounge, a large seating area, two double pull out couches and a television. There are three bedrooms, two with queen size beds and one with a single bed. All bedrooms are big, well lit, and have a great amount of storage space. Extra beds can be added in each room to accommodate up to 6 study abroad students. The kitchen is fully equipped, and there is a separate dining area as well. There are three bathrooms, all with showers, and a terrace complete with a table and a great view.

Situated in the heart of the historical centre of Florence, this 3-bedroom apartment is in the perfect location. The building is newly renovated, and is a has a warm contemporary style. The open living area consists of a sofa bed, a fireplace, and a flat screen television. There is a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area. Two of the bedrooms include 2 twin beds each, and the third has one single bed. All of the bedrooms are spacious and have plenty of space for storage. There are two luxury modern bathrooms, both of which have walk in showers.

This study abroad apartment in Florence is in a great location just two minutes away from the duomo, and very close to the central market. It was completely renovated in 2008, and beautifully furnished. There are two bedrooms, one with two single beds and two large windows, the other with a queen-sized bed. The kitchen is fully equipped with all modern appliances, and the living room has a double pull out and a television.

The building has a 24-hour surveillance camera security system and entrance to the complex is only enabled with security pass codes given to study abroad apartments tenants.
  • 2 bedrooms with two beds in each
  • 1 bedroom with a double bed
  • Apartment comes complete with bedding and towel sets for each student

This study abroad apartment is in a great location, it is close to all of the city’s most notable landmarks, and is lined with lovely boutiques and stores. It is located on the third floor of the building a building with an elevator. This spacious apartment can accommodate up to 6 people as it consists of 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. The beautiful foyer is illuminated with large windows, and has spectacular views of Via Porta Rossa and the church of Orsanmichele. All three bedrooms have queen beds, all of which can be separated into two singles. There is a full kitchen with an elaborate ceramic floor, which leads to an outdoor balcony. The apartment is traditionally decorated and has all of the amenities necessary for your stay.

€2,500 Deposit due upon arrival

Located in the heart of Santa Croce, the area is youthful as well as rich with ancient history, it is the perfect location to live abroad. This apartment can accommodate up to 4 people as it consists of 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and laundry faculties. Frescoed ceilings and intricately designed ceramic floors serve to hold up the authentic Florentine atmosphere. There is a bright living room with comfortable seating, and a fully equipped and spacious kitchen complete with dining for five. The master bedroom is beautifully decorated, furnished with a queen sixe canopy bed, and the second bedroom has 2 single beds. It is spacious enough where it is possible to add 1 more single bed to accommodate for a total 4 students studying abroad.

Situated on a quiet street in Trastevere, this quaint studio is perfect for one professional or student. The living area features a double bed, sofa bed, dining table, a small kitchenette with two burner hot plate and ample closet space. The bathroom has a stall shower, newly updated fixtures and beautiful tile work. One of the best features of this apartment is the shared rooftop terrace. From the roof you can see all of Historic Rome.

Located in the Gracia neighborhood, this Verdi Gracia Barcelona apartment complex is in a quiet and charming Barcelona district, also known as one of the most artistic and residential. This building is between the four main squares of Gracia, Plaza de la Virreina, Plaza del Sol, Plaza del Diamant, and Plaza de la Revolució, granting international students the convenience of social activities, nice restaurants and boutique shopping. The Verdi Gracia apartments in Barcelona provide easy access to international universities and classes with a five-minute walk to the nearest metro station. Students will enjoy the apartment's spacious, bright and modern features, as well as a beautiful rooftop terrace for sunbathing and relaxing! The building also includes 24-hour camera surveillance.

This building has definitely been a favorite for students throughout the past few years !

This apartment is newly renovated, and in a great spot; it is located just opposite of the house of Michelangelo and extremely  close to Santa Croce and Sant’Ambrogio’s daily farmer market. The living area is luminous with natural light, equipped with a double sofa bed as well as a flat screen television. The kitchen is modern, fully equipped and includes a beautiful dining area as  well. There are two large bedrooms, both bright and spacious.  The master has a queen sixe bed with sufficient storage space,  and the second has two twin beds with plenty of storage as well.  There is a modern and unique luxury bathroom, which includes a rainforest shower.

€2,000 Deposit due upon arrival

This Madrid apartment is very well equipped, and the visitors will feel at home from the start. To the right of the entrance, is the living room with a large window with a striking combination of colors, making it a friendly, fun and open space. The kitchen is also a very pleasant place, where you will find everything you need to prepare delicious meals.  The first bedroom is very comfortable with one bed and the second and third bedrooms have two beds and windows that provide light and space. Close to many tourist attractions it is ideal for those who want to spend time in Madrid in an amazing area in the city center.    Apartment Features:

  • 1 bathroom

The bedrooms are well decorated and each room has many closets; one with a double bed and private bathroom and the other with two single beds. The kitchen is spacious with a small breakfast bar. The dining room has a large wooden table and Indonesian style wooden beams.  The apartment is located a few meters away from the Plaza de Santa Ana one of the most emblematic places in the city. The apartment is a 1-minute walk from the popular Plaza de Santa Ana, 5 minutes from Puerta Sun and La Latina.    Apartment Features:
  • 2 bedrooms (3 beds)

Like any tourist street in central city, is surrounded by fast food shops, department stores fame. World and many restaurants with typical Spanish food. The Apartment: An apartment of 88 m2 recently renovated and very comfortable. It sleeps 6 people and has two bedrooms, a bathroom with shower and a modern kitchen.It is located on the fourth floor and has many windows allowing generous natural light. It has a distribution rather Conventional: in the entry, kitchen and dining room, and then a hallway leading to the living room andkitchen is notable for its vivid colors and modern furniture blue that gives character to the environment.. The dining table is really handy for all guests rooms are simple and comfortable. One has a double bed and wardrobe, the other with twin beds. The bathroom is modern, new and very nice. Exquisite decor, wooden floors and neutral colors have been combined with taste for performance just perfect!
post_excerpt: The apartment is located in one of the streets of downtown's busiest. A pedestrian street between the Puerta del Sol and Gran Via. A five minute walk from the Plaza de Cibeles. In the very center of the city. Walking can get everywhere: the Prado Museum, Retiro Park, Botanical Garden, the Royal Palace ...

post_content:
The apartment is located in a residential district between Calle Princesa and Calle Rosales: with a great variety of designer boutiques and important shopping centres, this is one of the most popular shopping areas in Madrid.


The apartment:

Spacious and conveniently laid out, the apartment counts with 3 independent, well separated bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a large living room with integrated open-plan kitchen. Whether traveling to Madrid with family, friends or work colleagues, the ideal layout of the Rosales II apartment will grant you a pleasant and comfortable stay.
A tasteful, quality renovation has been carried out in the apartment to ensure the best equipment is provided: good fitted wardrobes and floating floors are central to that. A pleasant interior decoration finally completes the offer, enabling guests to enjoy a fully satisfying Madrid experience.
The apartment can comfortably accommodate up to 8 people. One bedroom is equipped with a double bed and a full en-suite bathroom, the second bedroom counts with a double sofa bed and the third bedroom offers its guests a single bed that can be expanded and transformed in a double bed. The living room is furnished with a comfortable double sofa bed.

This Florence apartment is located in a beautiful historic building. It is in a great location, next to the ancient Pergola Theatre and behind the Duomo. The apartment has awesome wood beam ceilings and terracotta flooring throughout, complemented by the beautiful mix of contemporary and antique furnishing. The living area consists of a bright and spacious lounge with two sofas, a television, a separated dining are, and a fully equipped kitchen.There are two bedrooms, one with a queen-size bed and the other with twin beds; they are both decorated nicely and very spacious. The large bathroom consists of a walk in shower and additional storage space. This apartment’s décor, size and location make it a great fit for students studying abroad.

€2,000 Deposit due upon arrival

This apartment in Tel Aviv is spacious and a conveniently located self-catering accommodation in the heart of Tel Aviv, Israel and right near the beach. The apartment has free wi-fi it is located on the top floor of the building. The apartment is complete with a living room, bedrooms, a full kitchen and a dining area. The apartment boasts amazing views of various areas in Tel Aviv. Our Tel Aviv apartments provide 24-hour customer service. Guests can also enjoy VIP entrance at the leading night clubs in Tel Aviv or a discount on surfing lessons at a nearby beach. The flat located in the area known as "Lev" which means "Heart" as it is the historic part of Tel-Aviv surrounded by the signature architecture, big green trees and lively cafes.  Famous Rothschild Boulevard filled with vibrant life, colorful people and lots of entertainment places. Even though it is just Minutes walking from all Tel Aviv's main attractions and nightlife, it is still super quiet! The apartment is located in the heart of Tel Aviv, right next to the best restaurants, bars & cafes and cultural venues in Tel Aviv. A maximum of 5-10 min. walk from Dizengoff Center, fashionable Shenkin St., Habima Theater and Heikhal Ha Tarbut, art galleries, cinemas, the big market (Shuk Ha Karmel) and more. Near the apartment is Dizengoff Center Shopping Mall, and Ben Gurion Airport is a 20-minute drive from the apartment. Apartment Features:
  • Two bedrooms (70sqm)
  • living room,
  • located on the second floor, 1 bathroom
  • 2-4 max guests (2 double beds + sofa bed).

This apartment was designed for comfort and coziness for an unforgettable stay

The Latina VII Apartment is located in the heart of the Latina district, one of the most desired and attractive neighborhoods where the streets and buildings have been restored and the atmosphere can´t get any better. Tourists and locals enjoy side walk cafes and tapas bars during the night and day. 

The Apartment

The Latina VII Apartment has everything anyone could ever want for the perfect stay: plenty of natural light, an enviable decoration and it has all of the modern necessities.
It is laid out in loft style and can sleep eight: there is one separate bedroom with two single beds (one a trundle bed), two mezzanines, each with two double beds, which open onto the lounge and corridor and a double sofa bed in the lounge. One of the mezzanines is almost a mini-apartment of its own within Latina VII, with a bathroom with shower, a wooden closet and stairs to another mezzanine, where the bed is.
The two mezzanines are almost a second and third lounge, although not completely private, reached by climbing up a short ladder. The outward-facing lounge is very bright. The separate bedroom has plenty of natural light, a built-in closet and a trundle bed.

The Latina VII Apartment also has a full bathroom decorated with blue ceramic tiles. In general, the apartment has a nice atmosphere and exquisite decor. The combination of natural wooden windows and floors and the pastel colored walls. Furthermore, white has been used to create different dimensions and shades.

This apartment in Paris is very well located next to the 8th district and is only a few steps away from the Camps Elyses and the Arc de Triomphe. All the shops that you could need are very close, such as a supermarket, bakeries, and fish shop, as well as the high end shops on the most famous avenue in the world. You will particularly love the well known Poncelet market nearby, beloved by the inhabitants, where fresh fruit and vegetables are available and butchers offer their wares. Not to be missed is the fish shop Daguerre Mare, which is one of the best in Paris. Pierre Demours Street itself is very calm, the Lebon Street and its covered market (Le March Couvert de Ternes) are next door. The closest subway stops are Ternes, Argentine and Charles de Gaulle Etoile. Many bus lines also run through here.

post_content:
The Midi Saint Germain apartment is located on a 2nd floor and overlooks a secured inner courtyard. It is beautifully refurbished and brings together antique charm and modern comfort. The entrance hall leads to the right where there is a fully equipped separate kitchen and then on to the bathroom fitted with a walk in shower.

The main room has a spacious lounge area with a comfortable sofa bed (sleeps 2, 140 cm wide) where it’s great to relax while watching a show on the LCD TV, unless you'd rather surf the net thanks to the available Wifi access. The living area also has a dining alcove with a table to seat your dinner guests.

The two bedrooms, accessible from the main living area, are tastefully decorated and fitted with a built-in wardrobe and built-in desk. They both have a double, 120 cm wide bed each, which can sleep 2 mid-sized guests.

  • coffee maker

This beautifully renovated apartment is on the first floor (without lift) of a 20th century building. 
Your tastefully stylish living space seamlessly blends contemporary furnishings with thai-inspired decorative touches. The main room consists of the open plan kitchen, neatly separated from the rest of the room by a breakfast bar, and the living area, with sofa bed (140cm, sleeping two), LCD television and Wifi internet connection.

The apartment also has two bedrooms. The first is fitted with a sofa bed (140cm, sleeping two), while the second offers a spacious queen size bed (160cm) as well as a desk. Finally, the shower in the bathroom will ensure some well-earned relaxation after a long day in Paris. The Parc-des-Expositions Apartment is the perfect spot to combine business and pleasure in Paris. 

Please note: the apartment does not have a washing machine but there is a self-service launderette on the ground floor of the building.   Apartment Features
  • Pull out couch

  • Plasma TV

The Montmartre III apartment is located on the third floor of an early 19th century building that has been restored and renovated. Your accommodation offers a traditional Parisian decor and classic French style furniture.
The living room has been furnished with a large sofa (sleeps 1) where you will also be able to relax while taking full advantage of the superb LCD TV or the wireless Internet connection at your disposal. The kitchen is equipped and will allow you to cook your favorite dishes and enjoy them at the table located in the living room just for this very purpose.

Lastly, after relaxing in the bathroom which is fitted with a bathtub and shower, you will be able to benefit from a good night’s sleep in one of the two bedrooms, one with a double bed and the other furnished with two single beds, respectively.

Suited for 2 students with two bedrooms and one bathroom, this apartment is located within the barrio Gothico sector of the city, this Barcelona Beach Apartment is just a short distance from the beach and popular touring destinations. Walk five minutes to el Borne to find your-self immersed in a scene of old restaurants and bars as well as street artist galleries and museums.

This apartment also has features of Internet, A/C, balcony and gallery, washing machine and a kitchen with a microwave, a refrigerator and a freezer.

The Ferlandina apartment is just a block away from the Barcelona neighborhood, Eixample and two blocks from Placa Universidad. Young artists that hold cool exhibitions and pop-up museums populate the surrounding area. It is also in close proximity to tapas bars and two metro stations, which makes it convenient for study abroad students wishing to travel around.

Ferlandina can comfortably house up to 5 people with four bedrooms and one bathroom. It also has a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, Internet, elevator access, two balconies, a TV + DVD, bed linen & towels and a washing machine.

This bright and contemporary 3rd floor Florence apartment rental has large windows throughout allowing in plenty of natural light and is located on a quiet side street just steps from the magnificent Piazza Santa Croce in Florence's historical centre.
The recently renovated apartment features a fully equipped kitchen/dining area complete with laundry facilities, a large bedroom with a queen-size bed and plenty of storage space and a brand new bathroom with shower. Original wood beam ceilings are a focus point throughout the apartment adding character to the contemporary furnishings. €1,500 Deposit due upon arrival

The Arc de Teatre sits in heart of the Old City, just steps away from Las Ramblas. It is the perfect housing option for students looking to study abroad, located minutes from the La Boqueria supermarket, the Columbus monument, Montjuic Mountain, Old Port and Barceloneta, just to name a few. Students who have a passion for fashion can also find themselves a short distance from great shopping areas like Plaza Catalunya, Paseo de Gracia and Rambla de Catalunya. This apartment is ideal for international students’ looking to experience all Barcelona has to offer!

Stay in the heart of London
Located in the heart of the City of London, Still Life Museum of London offers modern self-catering accommodation with free WiFi. Barbican and Farringdon Tube Stations are only 5 minutes’ walk from the property. This contemporary 2 bedroom apartment features a balcony, and a living room with wooden floors, furnished with sofas and a dining table. The kitchen comes fully equipped. The flat has 2 bathrooms, one with a bath tub and one with a shower. The Museum of London and the London Wall are just 5 minutes’ walk from the flat. The iconic St Paul’s Cathedral is a located a mere 10 minutes’ walk. St Paul’s Tube Station offers easy access to Oxford Street and the West End in a 10-minute Tube journey. The scenic banks of the River Thames are a 15-minute walk away.

City of London is a great choice for travellers interested in churches, tours and bars.

Stay in the heart of London

Located right in the centre of London, Still Life Trafalgar Square offers a fully furnished self-catering apartment with free WiFi access throughout and an inner terrace. The property is situated 200 metres from Covent Garden and Leicester Square. This air-conditioned apartment includes a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a living area with a flat-screen TV, and a bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. A washing machine, a tumble dryer and ironing facilities are also available. Guests can prepare meals in the property's kitchen or visit one of the many cafés, pubs and restaurants in the immediate surroundings of the apartment. Several supermarkets are also located within a 10-minute walk. Trafalgar Square and Charing Cross both lie within a 5-minute walk from the accommodation. London Heathrow Airport is located 23 km away.

Westminster is a great choice for travellers interested in nature walks, shopping for makeup and chocolate.

Your stay will include:
Free WiFi Terrace

Situated just a 9-minute walk from the Tower of London and a 6-minute stroll from the iconic Gherkin, Still Life Tower Hill Executive offers self-catering accommodation in the heart of central London. With free WiFi access is available, the property is a 2-minute walk from Tower Hill Underground Station and just a minute's walk from London Fenchurch Train Station. The apartment features a TV and a seating area with a sofa. There is a fully-equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave. Featuring a bath or shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Tower Bridge is a 10-minute walk away from Still Life and City Hall is less than a mile away. Perfect for Students studying Abroad London Eye is 2.3 miles away and Somerset House is 1.9 miles away.
City of London is a great choice for travellers interested in churches, tours and bars.

Located just a 7-minute walk from The Shard in the busy London city centre, Still Life Borough Deluxe offers self-catering accommodation with free WiFi access for all guests. The property is a 3-minute stroll from Borough Underground Station and 7 minutes' walk from Borough Market.

The accommodation features a TV, a balcony and a terrace. There is a fully-equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave. With a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a bath a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy city view from the spacious apartment.

From the Borough Deluxe, Tower Bridge is less than a mile away and the Tower of London is a 24-minute journey on foot. HMS Belfast is 15 minutes' walk away.

Surrounded by popular tourist attractions, the property is also just 16 minutes' walk from Shakespeare's Globe and 1.2 miles from St. Paul's Cathedral.

Southwark is a great choice for travellers interested in skyline, churches and modern art.

Located in London, Still Life - Vauxhall offers self-catering accommodation with free WiFi, a bar and a restaurant. The property is a 3-minute walk from Vauxhall Underground Station on the Victoria Line and a 10-minute walk from Kia Oval cricket ground. Each of the stylish, contemporary apartments at Still Life feature a seating area with a sofa, a flat-screen TV, an iPod dock, a telephone and a fully-equipped kitchen. There is also an en suite bathroom with a shower and a bath. From the property, Vauxhall City Farm is a 7-minute walk away and Vauxhall Train Station is 3 minutes' journey on foot. Battersea Park is 1.3 miles away and Buckingham Palace is 1.4 miles away. Big Ben is just a 24-minute walk from the apartment.

These spacious apartments are set within the dynamic hub of Shoreditch. The area hosts a wealth of restaurants, bars, cafés, and of course the famous Spitalfields market. Within Shoreditch you will have the opportunity to experience something quintessentially London - and often overlooked by tourists. If you are a business traveller or student the advantages of being located within the city, and moments away from Liverpool St Station speak for themselves. The apartments are equipped with all the modern conveniences to make your stay truly comfortable. We provide free and unlimited business broadband to keep you connected. There is also a complementary weekly maid service included in all stays of 7 nights and over. During your stay our team will be available 7 days per week, and 24 hours per day for emergency support. Enjoy the comfort of your own private apartment, with the piece of mind that a professional team is on standby should you need assistance.

Additional Details

  • Each bedroom has double beds, but if you would like to add extra beds in each room we can add beds for £75 per bed.
  • Complementary weekly cleaning for bookings of 7 days or more.

With a choice of Aldgate East or Tower Hill both close by these apartment make a fantastic vantage point for a quick commute into the city, or a leisurely stroll down the Thames. Why not juxtapose the new and exciting in Shoreditch with the colossal feat of Victorian engineering which is Tower Bridge.

Dizengoff street - the most attractive and vital street in Tel Aviv! 
Located only a few minutes from all the sites of the city and between trendy and fun Ben Gurion- and Bazel streets where you have all the boutiques, bars, cafes and clubs within a couple of blocks only. Dizengoff and the surrounding areas are all easily reachable by public transportation! 

Amazing and newly renovated apartment (75 sqm) located on the 2nd floor (with elevator). Fully furnished and equipped for a great stay in TLV. The apartment has two big bedrooms: Master bedroom with queen sized bed, toilet\shower room and another bedroom with two single beds (you can connect the beds and thus enjoy double size). Stylish living room (which has a sofa-bed) with exit to an amazing green view balcony. Cozy shower\toilet room and a beautiful modern kitchen.  Apartment Features
  • central air conditioning
  • cable TV
  • free WiFi
  • fully equipped kitchen
  • fridge, microwave, stove, oven, toaster, kettle, etc.

The Rennes apartment is in an ideal location. Close to the Montparnasse train station, it allows you to get to the heart of Saint Germain des Près and the Jardins du Luxembourg… all on foot!   Subway lines 4 and 12 are just 100 meters away, and will get you to the other must-see Paris destinations in a few minutes time  The apartment Beautifully redone, this apartment is located on the ground floor of a superb inner courtyard, quiet and with security systems. Right from the start, you shall be captivated by this atypical accommodation’s modern decor. In order to maximize the living space, the sleeping area is placed on a mezzanine level which can sleep 2 guests (please be aware, that the ceiling's height does not allow guests to be in a full stand-up position). The main room has a lounge area with a comfortable sofa bed (sleeps 2) where you can enjoy the LCD TV or wireless internet connection at your disposal. The adjacent open-plan kitchen is fully equipped and will allow you (Why ever not?!) to try your hand at French cuisine! Last but not least, a large Italian shower promises a tonic wake up before going out to enjoy the wonders of Paris!

In Paris’ historic, and boutique-shopping areas

The Modern Montorgueil apartment is perfectly located on the edge of the Marais and Les Halles neighbourhoods.

It's located just steps away from a commercial pedestrian street, lined with restaurants, cafés and shops, and is just 100 meters from the Les Halles neighbourhood. Ideal for visiting the heart of Paris!

The immediate proximity of underground lines #4 (Réaumur-Sébastopol stop) and #3 (Sentier stop) also grant you access to the Saint-Germain-des-Prés neighbourhood, to famous department stores and even to the neighbourhood where the Garnier Opera House is located.


The apartment: 

Accessed through a pedestrian street, rue Montorgueil, this apartment is located on the 3rd floor of a traditional building that is typical to this nneighborhood An elevator serves the 1st floor. The 2nd and 3rd floors however can only be accessed via the stairs.

The main room overlooks an inner courtyard and has all the comforts necessary for your stay.

The living-room has a coffee table and a sofa on which you can sit and watch TV or surf the net via the wireless Internet access.

The adjoining kitchen, compact and functional, will allow you to prepare all your favourite dishes. You'll be able to enjoy your meals on the living-room's modular table which can be lifted and transformed easily to create a high dining-table if necessary.

The sleeping area can be organised in a jiffy thanks to the convertible sofa bed (sleeps 2) and a stow-away bed which can be stored in a closet during the day so you can benefit from all the extra space during the day. This bed can be easily pulled out and can sleep two people.

In the morning, the adjoining bathroom will provide you with a refreshing wake-up before heading out to discover Paris!  
  • APPLIANCES: washing machine, iron & ironing board, hairdryer, oven, toaster, microwave, coffee maker, kettle, Fridge
  • MULTIMEDIA: DVD player, telephone, Cable TV, Plasma TV/USB, satellite TV

The apartment:

Warm color tones and spots of red give this ultra compact and all-equipped studio a unique aesthetic appeal.

The apartment is located on a pedestrian street, on the 1st floor (no elevator) of a traditional Parisian building.

The layout has been optimized for your utmost comfort. There is a comfortable sofa bed that sleeps 2. Laying on the sofa bed you will be able to appreciate this studio's original trait. In fact, in order to give the place a dynamic flow and boost the height of the studio a large mirror has been hung from the ceiling!

Modern day comfort has not been forgotten either: coffee table that unfolds into dining table in the blink of an eye, LCD TV set and wireless Internet access are available.

Last but not least, an equipped open plan kitchen and a superb shower will make your Paris stay unforgettable.

In the heart of Paris!

The Jewel apartment is superbly located in the Marais district, right in the heart of Paris.

The Joaquin Maria apartment is seamlessly positioned in central Madrid. Located in the Chamberi neighborhood, a residential area where trees line the streets, yet within stress-free walking distance from numerous bars, restaurants and shops. The area has a shopping facility very close by making it a great resource for international students to find anything needed for their stay. Eventful city spots such as Tribunal, Chueca, plaza Dos-de-Mayo, Plaza España and Paseo de la Castellaña are on one side with Gran Via on the other. All are within easy reach and blend with calmer parts such as Parque del Oeste and calle Pintor Rosales. The campus of Madrid’s Complutense University is also within walking distance which makes the area a great location for study abroad students. The apartment is outstanding for public transportation, with four different metro lines situated between 2 and 7 minutes walking from the Joaquin Maria apartment (stations: Isla Filipinas, Moncloa, Arguelles, and Quevedo). There is a supermarket, a bank, a hair salon directly across the street an a pharmacy on the corner, coffee bars, dry cleaners, bakeries, fruit shops on many of the nearby side streets. The 80 m2, 5th floor apartment (with an elevator) has been newly restored with a very clean and bright feel. The Joaquin Maria apartment is modern and designed to syndicate easy and relaxing private living in the three bedrooms and living room. The apartment can comfortably house 3 to 4 people. The doors at the end of the living room open onto a balcony overlooking the treetops and the street. One bedroom is tremendously spacious with a private bathroom and walk-in shower. The wardrobe, side tables and chest of drawers are handmade for the room from natural dark cherry-wood. Two people can comfortably sleep here. The second bedroom is bright with a large windows, a large three door wardrobe. Two people can comfortably sleep here. This room is slightly smaller than the other two bedrooms, and sleeps one person.
