Located in one of Florence’s most lively areas, this apartment is only a few minutes away from main attractions such as the Cathedral, Accademia, and Cappelle Medices, and is surrounded by numerous cafes, restaurants and markets as well. This charming, and well-designed two-floor apartment accommodates up to six people, perfect for study abroad students.  There are two bedrooms (2 can sleep in each), and a sofa bed in the living room. On the main floor, there is a fully equipped kitchen, a spacious living room with a dining table for six, a modern bathroom, one bedroom, and a small laundry room. Upstairs, there is a useful workspace, as well as the other bedroom. The apartment comes with air conditioning, Wi-Fi, a flat screen television and a dishwasher which is a rare luxury in Florence and a nice feature for study abroad students.

In this spacious apartment the visitor of Madrid can pass a very pleasant stay in the heart of the city, close to all the major attractions. Its space and distribution make this flat a perfect choice. Only some minutes away from the Atocha train station – an emblematic place of the city because of its historic building. Currently it is the only train station at which the high-speed trains AVE arrive. Therefore, it is one of the most important gates to the city. The apartment’s location could not be better – from here on you can reach all the important museums within a few minutes walk: the Reina Sofia, Prado, Caixa Forum, and a lot more interesting places… The Apartment: Large, modern, recently renovated and decorated in a way to please its visitor with good taste. The flat has 3 bedrooms, one with a double bed and an ‘ensuite’ bathroom, the other having each two single beds. From the entrance of the apartment you get into the kitchen, separated by a very original glass wall. The kitchen is very modern, furnished with good materials and has all the necessary facilities: dishwasher, washing machine, dryer, oven, microwave,…On the left-hand side of the entrance there is the living room – a very spacious room with the typical balconies from which you can enjoy views on the street Atocha, one of the most important streets of Madrid. Because of this location, the living room has a lot of daylight and as the apartment is on the 3rd floor and has well-isolated windows, noise will not be a disturbance. From this entrance, which is composed of the living room and the kitchen, you can reach the bedrooms via the corridor that you will find on the right-hand side. First, there are the two bedrooms with single beds – the first with a very comfortable pull-out bed that can be optionally used as a single or as a double bed, the second one with two single beds. Both have cupboards so that there is enough space to store clothes. Furthermore, both rooms are interior so that there is no disturbing noise from the street. Between the two rooms, there is a complete bathroom with shower decorated in a very original style in dark blue colors. At the end of the corridor you will find the main bedroom, which is spacious, comfortable, equipped with a large built-in wardrobe and a stylish wooden bureau. This room is connected with the bathroom via a glass wall in the same fashion as the kitchen. The bathroom is completely equipped with a large white bath tub and a wooden piece of furniture below the sink to store clothes. Its central location and practical distribution make this apartment the perfect choice for any kind of guest.

This Florence apartment is newly renovated, and right near Piazza Santa Croce, perfect for study abroad living. The apartment is ideal for up to three people living. The apartment opens into a kitchen dining area that is fully equipped, including laundry facilities. It features one bedroom, with a double bed and plenty of storage. The spacious living room has a single daybed, a television and more storage space. There is a full bathroom as well.

Just one minute from Piazza Santa Croce, an ancient square in Florence, this study abroad apartment building is peaceful and in a great location. The apartment is located on the highest floor of an ancient Florentine building. There is a large double bedroom that has a bathroom, as well as a twin bedroom, and another full bathroom. The open plan kitchen and living area is bright and spacious, and includes a dining table and a comfortable sofa. The apartment has air conditioning in the master bedroom as well as in the corridor. €2,000 Deposit due upon arrival

One bedroom apartment located on Via Fienaroli in the heart of Trastevere, close to the majestic church and Piazza of Santa Maria in Trastevere. This 55mt2/592 sq feet apartment has been newly refurbished. This ground floor apartment is in a charming small complex which was built in the 1600’s. There is a living room with a pull out sofa bed and very unique olive hard wood floors, shelves, wood burning fireplace, glass dining table for 4. The new small separate kitchen is equipped with: microwave, toaster oven, 2 burner electric stove top, washing machine and kitchen utensils. The second floor is an open space overlooking the living room where you will find the full size bed, closet space and the separate bathroom with shower/tub. Large windows in the living room brings in light, the cobble stone street is quiet & characteristic.

Typical Roman charm with modern amenities! Located on a scenic side street in the center of historic Rome, this spacious 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment is an excellent find for any student. The apartment opens up to the large living room, furnished with a brand new sofa, dining table, beautiful art and high wood-beam ceilings. The kitchen is equipped with a "Manhattan style" bar/countertop, electric stove, refridgerator, freezer, sink and washing machine. Down the hallway is the bedroom, which has ample closet space, a large bed, and AC. Down the hallway from the bedroom is the bathroom, including all the essentials and a bath tub!

Nestled on a quiet back street in Rome’s Prati neighborhood, this newly renovated three-bedroom, three-bathroom apartment is a spectacular choice for students. The bedrooms can be configured with two single beds in each room. The full-kitchen has a dishwasher, washing machine/dryer, refrigerator, gas stovetop and oven. Each of the three bathrooms has a stall shower, sink and toilet.

Located on a small street in the heart of Florence, living in this apartment will give you a true sense of the life in this city. Right outside the building are main attractions such as the Duomo, Piazza Signoria, Ponte Vecchio and the Uffizi Gallery, as well as numerous restaurants, cafes, markets, and the best gelato shops. It could not be a better location for a study abroad student! In addition, there is a cute little fresh fruit stand right outside the door!  The spacious and open floor plan has a living room area with dining, which seats six, as well as a fully equipped kitchen. The  apartment has four single beds, which is nice as it accommodates all guests equally.

€2,000 Deposit due upon arrival

Great apartment for study abroad students. Two bedroom two bathroom property located on Via Pandolfini. This small street is nestled between the Duomo, Piazza Signoria & Piazza Santa Croce. This area is very popular for students with boutique stores, cafes, fresh markets and grocery stores. Then one street south of the apartment is Via Ghibellina that has many restaurants, pharmacies, cafes, the Verdi Theatre, Bargello Museum and the Michelangelo House.

The apartment is located in a residential building on the 2nd floor. For American standards it is considered the 3rd floor. As you enter the apartment there is a sunny entryway with single sofa, large windows and high ceilings. Off the entry way to the right, there is a spacious living room with one sofa and one double sofabed.

Down the hallway on the left is the second bedroom with two twin beds and medium sized armoire, large windows and high ceilings. There is an additional full bathroom across the hallway with bathtub and shower head. At the end of the hallway you turn to the right to the dining room and fully equipped kitchen.

 

€2,000 Deposit due upon arrival

This spacious and bright Florence apartment is just steps away from Ponte Vecchio, Uffizi Gallery and Piazza Santa Croce. It is located in a small piazza facing a pretty internal courtyard, and is surrounded by shops, a super market, and tons of restaurants. This tranquil and private location is ideal for living abroad. This apartment can sleep up to 8 and is located on the third floor (without an elevator). The lounge area is large and luminous, and overlooks the courtyard. It’s furnished with a sofa, TV and a dining area as well. There are 3 bedrooms, 2 of which have  queen size beds and the last has a single bed. All three have plenty of storage space available. There are also 2 bathrooms,  one includes a bathtub/shower, and the other has a walk in shower.

€2,500 Deposit due upon arrival

Traditional 14th century 3 bedroom spacious apartment just next to the Arno and Piazza Santa Corce.

Lovely quiet and private space within the heart of historical Florence; The apartment is located less then 5 minutes walk from Ponte Vecchio and Piazza Signoria, and approximatly 10/15 minutes walk to the Duomo.

The fist floor apartment has been carfully and traditionally renovated, and has air conditioning and heating in every room. It has a quirky and interesting lay out with origional beams, stone exposure, origional shutters, antique furnishings and origional flooring in places.

Acess to the third bedroom and second bathroom is through a 1.6mt beamed study. Living room and second bedrooom look out to each other accross a courtyard and double french shuttered doors.

Fully functinal and equipped modern bathrooms and kitchen and extendable dining space for up to 3-4 students studying abroad within the living area with additional channel TV and ipod speaker doc etc.

€2,500 Deposit due upon arrival

The apartment is located on the third floor of a building with  an elevator, and is extremely close to Piazza Duomo, Via Tornabuoni and Piazza Repubblica. It is in the city center near the most beautiful streets with shopping, museums, churches,  and restaurants. It was completely renovated in November 2014, and has exposed beams and wooden floors in all of the rooms.

There are three double bedrooms (two with double beds) in addition to a sofa bed in the living room. There are two bathrooms, both with showers. An extra bed can be arranged and brought into the apartment as well to accommodate another  person. The living room has new flat screen TV, and from the  living room you enter the fully equipped kitchen and dining area, which can accommodate 8 people. One spacious bedroom has a window facing Via della Vigna Nuova.

The next bedroom has  a comfortable double bed, a large wardrobe, an antique dresser and a private bathroom with a window on the courtyard. Then the third bedroom, with a view of Via Federighi. The furniture, lights and paintings create an elegant mix of traditional and modern. There is the luxury of air conditioning in every room.

€2,500 Deposit due upon arrival

This two bedroom apartment is located on the first floor of a building in the Santa Croce neighborhood of Florence. It has been completely renovated with modern décor and is an ideal choice for those who want to stay in the heart of the Old City. The area of Santa Croce is one of the best in the city as it has everything needed for a comfortable vacation.

The Sant’Ambrogio fresh market is just around the corner, as well as multiple grocery stores, cafes, bars and wonderful restaurants. You within a 10 minute walk to the Ponte Vecchio, Uffizi Gallery and Santa Croce Cathedral, and only 15 minute walk to our beloved Duomo. Perfect for you study abroad stay.

As you enter the apartment there is a spacious & bright living room. There is a double sofa bed and dining table for 4 people. The kitchen is fully equipped with oven, dishwasher, microwave, refrigerator, and all major utensils.

There are two bedrooms, one with two single beds which can be joined together to make a King bed, and a second bedroom with one & half size bed. There is a newly renovated bathroom with shower.

€2,500 Deposit due upon arrival

This gorgeous mid-term rental is located across Michelangelo’s house and a short distances from Piazza Santa Croce and Sant’Ambrogio’s farmers market where you can buy fresh produce daily. The apartment has been renovated in a contemporary style and it is a fully equipped modern units. The apartment leads to a spacious dining area and the spacious lounge has a double sofa bed and chairs with an LCD TV, perfect for study abroad students to relax.

There is a large bedroom with a king-size bed and large wardrobe, a double bedroom with a queen size bed, and a twin bedroom and a smaller single bedroom in addition to the double and single sofa beds available. To accommodate larger groups, this student apartment rental is located in the same building as our apartments. Please inquire with us about renting multiple apartments within same building. This apartment is managed directly by our Florence providers and we guarantee a very high-quality service and assistance during your stay.

€2,500 Deposit due upon arrival

The Ramblas Boqueria apartment complex is located in a recently renovated building with an elevator and 24-hour surveillance cameras. The building is located in the sunny street of Junta de Comerc close to Plaza Catalunya and La Boqueria which makes this is the perfect apartment for your Study Abroad experience. This Barcelona apartment is comfortably situated in the heart of the city, close to El Born, La Barceloneta, Eixample and other parts of Barcelona. Ramblas Boqueria is two blocks to the nearest Metro and bus stop that run all day for commute to classes and throughout the city. The apartment is recently renovated and furnished for absolute comfort. Sunny spacious bedrooms and living room, nice modern furniture and fully-equipped bathrooms are ready for your stay in one of our favorite apartments in Barcelona.

Located on the border of Prague zone 1 and Prague zone 2, this high-end apartment building is situated in Nove Mesto. This stylish and spacious apartments offer free exclusive services including 24-hour reception service in the building. The complex also has locker areas to store luggage and a full-service maintenance team. For transportation, the nearest metro station is "Karlovo Namesti" (Line B) and the nearest tram stop is "Botanicka zahrada" (Lines 18 and 24) making for an easy commute to class and various international universities. Apartments come with high-speed WIFI and TV access to various international channels. The building has a 24-hour surveillance camera security system and entrance to the complex is only enabled with security pass codes given to study abroad apartments tenants.

  • 1 double bedroom with an option of a double bed or 2 single beds
  • 1 complete bathroom with a shower
  • Apartment equipped with complete bedding and towels sets

The Antonio Scialoia apartment was fully renovated in 2010, and is located on the first floor of a residential building within the Campo di Marte neighborhood in the heart of Florence, Italy. There is a spacious double master bedroom with a master bathroom overlooking the private garden. There is a second bedroom with twin beds and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, microwave, mixer, rice cooker, deep fryer, dishwasher and kitchen utensils.

Next to the kitchen is the dining room with a table for up to people. The sitting area has a sofa-bed and flat screen TV, satellite decoder with Sky TV, Playstation, VCR and home theater system and a selection of DVDs and music CDs.

This spot for midterm student rentals for international students. Enjoy a home away from home in this elegant residential area of the Old City.

 

€2,000 Deposit due upon arrival

You’re a student and you’re looking for housing in the center of Madrid? There are various 2 bedroom apartments in Madrid, but this one is one of a kind given the fact that it right by the Mercado de San Miguel and Royal Palace. The apartment is located smack dab in the center of the city, which is great for those who love to walk around and really get a feel for Madrid. Aside from that once you start going out with your friends and participating in the night life, you will be able to walk to and from the apartment without having to spend on a taxi or metro. It is located between metro stops: Opera and Sol. This is a 2 bedroom apartment that is fully equipped so you will hardly need to buy anything for the kitchen, living room or bedrooms.

This apartment will be a comfortable housing option for a student of the Complutense university. It is located in one of the best areas of Madrid, Barrio Moncloa, and is in conveniently located near to the Universidad Compultense de Madrid. Enjoy its charming surroundings, number of natural green areas, and a variety of shops and cafés. Immerse yourself in the college atmosphere and enjoy the large number of smaller bars and nightlife options in the area. There is also a large park nearby where one can lay out and enjoy a warm sunny day. In excellent condition and fully furnished, this 3 bedroom 1 bathroom flat is an excellent choice for students and workers alike. The apartment comes fully furnished and provides an ample amount of closet space in the bedrooms. This is a doorman building in Madrid and perfect for students.

Housing in Madrid: looking to rent a flat in the Spanish capital? La Latin…sound familiar? Have your friends told you great stories about this neighborhood? They are all true! This is the place to be/live in Madrid, smack dab in the center of the city, you can walk in any direction, without having a map or directions and you will without a doubt bump into something amazing to do or see. Yes, this apartment is in the mix of what is La Latina. It is a 2 bedroom apartment and those 2 rooms are huge! Each have their own living room, equipped with sofa, TV, plus all of the typical bedroom furnishings. The dining room is in between the kitchen and interior patio, yep that’s right, there is an interior patio that is just for those that live here. Which you can use to host gatherings like; dinner parties, brunches or pre/post party hangouts. Do we really need to say more about this place? Oh yeah internet and water is included in the bills!

Nice, and affordable apartment for rent in Madrid that is perfect for study abroad students. This apartment is only a few minutes walk on the way to the city center and located next to a metro stop that takes you to class easily at one of the most popular international universities. 2 bedroom apartment with 1 bedroom is great for 2-3 people looking for international student housing. The best part of it all is that you’ll be so close to everything that when your friends hit you up to hang out it will be easy to meet up in some of the coolest areas of Madrid.

The apartment is located in the center of the city, which is great for study abroad students who love to walk around and get a feel for Madrid. Aside from that once you start going out with your friends and participating in the night life, you will be able to walk to and from the apartment without having to spend on a taxi or metro. It is located between metro stops: Gran Via, Chueca and Callao. This is a 2 bedrooms apartment that is completely renovated and equipped so you will hardly need to buy anything for the kitchen, living room or bedrooms. The apartment has two queen beds and is perfect for two students.

This room for rent in Madrid is the smallest of all of the rooms with a single bed, spacious closet, nice desk and chair plus a beautiful decoration and flat screen TV. Rent a single room in this 6 bedrooms 2 baths masterpiece located in between the Madrid River and La Latina. Behind the Almudena Cathedral and Royal Palace, which are all prime locations within Madrid. Maybe you have no idea where these locations are, but take our word for it, it’s exactly where you want to be. You will find yourself meeting your friends for a night out in the town, no more than 10 minutes on foot from this apartment, which comes in handy when returning home. The apartment is beautifully decorated, with a large flat screen TV in the living room & 2 pull out couches for when friends visit. The kitchen is fully equipped, so you won’t need to buy kitchen supplies for cooking. Each bedroom has a large closet, desk, chair and flat screen TV. But the best part is that all the utilities are included in the rental price…yep that even included internet. Are you really still thinking about renting a room here?

Rent this lively and exciting 3 bedrooms student flat, which is located in the La Latina neighborhood of Madrid, would be perfect for 3 exciting and lively students! The area in which the apartment is located is beyond excellent; a very commercial area located in the center of Madrid walking distance from everything: Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor, Atocha train station and the Retiro Park. Aside from all of this you also have at your disposal one of the best markets in Madrid, which is jammed packed daily with fresh products, fruit, meat and seafood. So if you find yourself walking home from class or work, stop by at one of the hundreds of bars, restaurants, shops or cafes and unwind after a long day of hard work.

Centrally located 4 bedroom 2 bath apartment next to the lovely Opera house. Enjoy living in a truly Madrileño atmosphere where a number of cafes, bars, restaurants, and boutiques surround you. This study abroad apartment is an ideal place to live in, given its location to a countless number of shops, bars, restaurants and clubs. Share this abroad apartment with your friends and discover the fantastic neighborhood. There are 4 bedrooms, 2 of them exterior and the other 2 are smaller with single beds, there are also 2 full bathrooms in this comfy apartment with a fully equipped kitchen. As a whole, the apartment is fully equipped with all the necessary amenities one would need to live comfortably. Only a 5 minute walking distance to the metro station Opera & Callao (Lines 2, 3, 5 & R)  and this particular station is also excellent to grab countless buses.

This beautiful 4 bedrooms and 2 baths apartment for rent is located in the center of Madrid, a few steps from the Plaza de Tirso de Molina (which is also a metro station) and 5 mins walk from La Latina, Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor & Puerta Cerrada. The apartment is equipped with internet, TV, “L” shaped couch and more. The kitchen is equipped with washing machine, fridge, stove and oven, plus all the kitchen supplies you’ll need. All four rooms are quite spacious and some have exterior views. The rental price includes the cost of internet, electricity, water and gas. There is also a cleaning service but that must be paid separately from the rent.

Looking for student housing and want to live in the center of Madrid but away from the noise and chaos? This bright and spacious 3 bedroom flat is located about a 15 minute walk to La Latina, which is also known as Madrid de los Austrias. In this neighborhood you can enjoy very authentic Spanish culture and some of the most typical food of the city. The area is very tranquil, you have a market next to the apartment and in front there is rec center with basketball, tennis and soccer courts, as well as an indoor pool. This would be a great option for 3 friends who want to have fun and enjoy Madrid, but also want to be able to come to a quiet home to relax and work or study.

If you are a student looking for housing in Madrid you will love this fantastic 6 bedrooms 3 (1 private) baths apartment located in one of the best areas of the city, Barrio Moncloa, which is conveniently located near to the: Comillas University, the Universidad Complutense de Madrid, ICADE, and many others. Enjoy its charming surroundings, number of natural green areas, and a variety of shops and cafés. Brand new 13 bedroom student residence in the center of Madrid with all of the utility costs included and a cleaning service. The apartment is located in the absolute center of the city. It is one minute to the left from Puerta del Sol, one minute to the right from Opera. The famous Joy Eslava night club is right across from the residence. Six of the bedrooms have beautiful balconies, all of them with view of the amazing Arenal Street. All of the rooms have a flat screen TV, and, as you can see, are beautifully decorated. The residence has five bathrooms, a fully equipped, gorgeous kitchen, and a very comfy and inviting living room where you can chill out and watch a movie on a late sunny afternoon. Rooms in this beautiful 4 bedroom apartment are available to rent. The apartment is located in the center of Madrid, within walking distance of Gran Via, one of the most exciting places to be in the city. The neighborhood is filled with bars, restaurants, and shops that are always busy. If you decide you want to go out to a club with your friends, you will be in luck because the apartment is close to everything. It is close to the Callao metro station, should you decide to escape the insanity of Gran Via. You can get anywhere in the city via the metro. The flat itself is very charming. It is fully equipped with stylish furnishings and all the amenities you could need while in Madrid. Each room has a bed, closet, desk, and chair. It is perfect for anyone who is looking to study or work in the city.

Nestled on a quiet, back-street in historic Trastevere, this large one-bedroom apartment is a perfect blend of old world charm and modern conveniences. This apartment can easily be configured for one, two or three tenants. The large living room has leather pull-out sofa or traditional day bed with lots of storage space. The spacious bathroom features a soaking tub and period blue tile. The eat-in kitchen is enormous and equipped with a 5-burner stovetop, oven, washing machine, full-size refrigerator and plenty of counter space to prepare delicious Italian meals. The large bedroom has two beds, but a third bed can be brought in for those tenants desiring a completely separate living area. The bedroom has floor to ceiling closets with plenty of storage.

A convenient location and spacious layout are two major components of this great find on Viale Trastevere. The apartment’s three bedrooms, two bathrooms and large living room, which line both sides of the apartment, all have windows that provide sunlight and views to the street below and interior courtyard. The bathrooms each have shower stalls, and there is ample storage space throughout the hallway in the built-in closets. The versatile bedrooms each have different features, one has a matrimonial sized bed, one has a full-size day bed and the last one has two twin beds which can be made into a matrimonial size. All of the rooms are located off of the main hallway, which provides roommates with privacy, and the large living room offers a communal space for gatherings. With it’s modern amenities and cozy breakfast table, the kitchen serves as both an additional dining area and space to cook meals with ease. The living room also doubles as a dining room and has a comfortable sofa and television.An ideal space for several people looking to enjoy the convenience of living in Trastevere in a spacious and modern apartment.
